<h3 id="X35652">X(35652) = ORTHOLOGIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: INVERSE-IN-EXCIRCLES TO ANTI-ARTZT</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; (b+c)*a^2+(b^2+4*b*c+c^2)*a-2*(b+c)*b*c  :  :

<br>
<b>X(35652) = X(942)+2*X(3159) = X(2901)+2*X(5044) = 2*X(3971)+X(4891) = 4*X(4075)-X(34790) = 2*X(5045)+X(24068)</b>
<p>
The reciprocal orthologic center of these triangles is X(35653)</p>
<p>X(35652) lies on these lines:
{1,3967}, {2,37}, {6,30568}, {42,4009}, {45,11679}, {57,17262}, {141,4656}, {210,28581}, {226,17243}, {329,4851}, {333,16814}, {354,28582}, {375,35104}, {518,3971}, {519,960}, {545,553}, {612,4387}, {726,3742}, {740,3740}, {756,3706}, {940,17351}, {942,3159}, {975,19276}, {1089,6051}, {1100,27064}, {1104,33309}, {1155,32936}, {1211,17229}, {1215,15569}, {1279,32926}, {1386,4011}, {2176,16834}, {2321,5743}, {2886,4078}, {2901,5044}, {2999,17318}, {3185,4421}, {3241,8834}, {3305,17348}, {3452,3950}, {3679,3714}, {3683,17763}, {3687,3943}, {3715,17156}, {3720,3994}, {3725,14752}, {3731,5737}, {3745,32930}, {3748,32927}, {3782,3834}, {3823,3914}, {3838,29653}, {3844,4425}, {3846,6541}, {3848,24165}, {3912,4415}, {3923,4682}, {3932,24210}, {3948,25102}, {3961,4702}, {3991,34852}, {4003,30957}, {4052,17758}, {4066,27784}, {4135,24325}, {4361,7308}, {4362,15254}, {4363,17022}, {4383,4852}, {4417,17242}, {4439,29655}, {4500,4762}, {4519,31330}, {4640,29649}, {4643,34255}, {4654,17313}, {4670,5287}, {4679,33088}, {4715,17781}, {4719,25079}, {4849,27538}, {4883,17165}, {4884,11019}, {4918,24982}, {4970,24003}, {5045,24068}, {5087,29671}, {5268,5695}, {5302,17733}, {5739,17372}, {5905,17376}, {6687,26723}, {6703,17355}, {9639,22836}, {10157,29016}, {14555,17299}, {14759,33908}, {14829,17261}, {15481,32853}, {15668,25430}, {16676,18229}, {17231,27184}, {17265,23681}, {17267,25527}, {17276,18141}, {17314,18228}, {17354,29841}, {17374,33066}, {17605,29643}, {17777,33073}, {20363,21902}, {20691,25125}, {21071,29594}, {28609,29573}</p>
<p>
X(35652) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {2, 3175}, {210, 32915}, {354, 32925}<br>
X(35652) = reflection of X(24165) in X(3848)<br>
X(35652) = lies on the circumconic with center X(35113))<br>
X(35652) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (192, 18743, 3752), (3210, 30829, 16602), (3666, 3995, 4681), (3995, 4358, 3666), (4664, 20942, 2), (4718, 16602, 3210), (20691, 30830, 25125), (27064, 34064, 1100)<br>
</p>
